title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: 2oz FS US License Plates with "BITCOIN or "SATOSHI" These are the plastic variety of cards and are non-denominatedSome of you may know him on IG - stacking.nyc I had him make me a 2oz silver with the Florida Plates and the word "BITCOIN" on it - the tags read "Since 2009"They use a UV printer to print directly onto the silver.PRICE: $90 (US shipping included in price)PYMT METHOD:Bitcoin and to this address only: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esCan also pay via Lightning if your wallet supports LN addresses: moparmining@walletofsatoshi.comPlease DM me or post your TXN ID here.SHIPPING: Shipping can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones. when making your request, put your name, what state plate you want and whether you want "BITCOIN" or "SATOSHI"example: MoparMiningLLC - Florida - "BITCOIN"

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: no interest? talk to me folks, too expensive? want me to make them loadable? let me know!

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Ah I missed all 50 states were available.. Sorry!  I'm def glad you got stacking.nyc to get it made tho, he's definitely good person. Did he make it himself or have a third party do it do you know? I didn't know he made his own stuff myself until this...

Did he make it himself or have a third party do it do you know? I didn't know he made his own stuff myself until this... yes! all 50 states available!he is working directly with keystone mint
